verses.verse: Ahab<WH256> told<WH5046> Jezebel<WH348> all that Elijah<WH452> had done,<WH6213> and how he had killed<WH2026> all the prophets<WH5030> with the sword.<WH2719>

He came<WH935> there to a cave,<WH4631> and lodged<WH3885> there;<WH1697> and behold, the word of Yahweh<WH3068> came to him,<WH559> and he said to him,<WH452> "What are you doing here, Elijah?"

He said,<WH559> "I have been very<WH7065> jealous<WH7065> for Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Armies;<WH6635> for the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> have forsaken<WH5800> your covenant,<WH1285> thrown down<WH2040> your altars,<WH4196> and slain<WH2026> your prophets<WH5030> with the sword.<WH2719> I,<WH3498> even I only, am left; and they seek<WH1245> my life,<WH5315> to take it away.<WH3947>"

He said,<WH559> "Go out,<WH3318> and stand<WH5975> on the mountain<WH2022> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>" Behold,<WH3068> Yahweh passed by,<WH5674> and a great<WH1419> and strong<WH2389> wind<WH7307> tore<WH6561> the mountains,<WH2022> and broke in pieces<WH7665> the rocks<WH5553> before<WH6440> Yahweh;<WH3068> but Yahweh<WH3068> was not in the wind.<WH7307> After<WH310> the wind<WH7307> an earthquake;<WH7494> but Yahweh<WH3068> was not in the earthquake.<WH7494>

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to him,<WH3212> "Go, return<WH7725> on your way<WH1870> to the wilderness<WH4057> of Damascus.<WH1834> When you arrive,<WH935> you shall anoint<WH4886> Hazael<WH2371> to be king<WH4428> over Syria.<WH758>

So he departed<WH3212> there,<WH4672> and found Elisha<WH477> the son<WH1121> of Shaphat,<WH8202> who was plowing,<WH2790> with twelve<WH8147> yoke<WH6776> of oxen before<WH6440> him,<WH8147> and he with the twelfth: and Elijah<WH452> passed<WH5674> over to him,<WH7993> and cast his mantle on him.<WH155>

He left<WH5800> the oxen,<WH1241> and ran<WH7323> after<WH310> Elijah,<WH452> and said,<WH559> "Let me please kiss<WH5401> my father<WH1> and my mother,<WH517> and then I will follow<WH3212> you.<WH559>" He said to him,<WH3212> "Go back again;<WH7725> for what have I done to you?<WH6213>"
